abstract: Biogen Idec nominated four directors to its board and urged its shareholders to reject a slate offered by Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor who is seeking control of the biotechnology company.
lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec nominated four directors to its board and urged its shareholders to reject a slate offered by Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor who is seeking control of the biotechnology company.

headline.main: Biogen Urges Shareholders to Reject Icahn Slate
